response.overview: A documentary - the first of its kind in Italy - that deals with the theme of homosexuality in adolescence. Filmed with students from three different high schools in Milan (a technical institute, a classical high school, and a scientific high school) who come together to talk about homosexuality and compare themselves with their gay and lesbian peers. Confusion about their sexual orientation, homophobia in society, isolation in the family and at school, and the desire for visibility: are the themes that the group addresses, in a common effort to understand and get to know each other. As the director emphasizes in the presentation of the documentary: "The kids listen to each other and compare themselves on an emotional level, each discovering that they are different from the other, but for this very reason all the same in wanting to grow up by affirming their specificity.
response.title: Nessuno Uguale
